item.title: “As for Me and My House, We Will Serve the Lord”
item.description:
“As for Me and My House, We Will Serve the Lord” by Elder H. Bryan Richards, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 168th Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 1998
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder H. Bryan Richards, Of the Seventy

item.title: Remember the Teachings of Your Father
item.description:
